div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ResearchSubject` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `ResearchSubject`. Element `ResearchSubject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject`.
Element `ResearchSubject.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.meta`.
Element `ResearchSubject.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.implicitRules`.
Element `ResearchSubject.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.language`.
Element `ResearchSubject.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.text`.
Element `ResearchSubject.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.contained`.
Element `ResearchSubject.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.identifier`.

Note that the target element context `ResearchSubject.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `ResearchSubject.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.status`.
Element `ResearchSubject.progress` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.type` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.subjectState` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.subjectState` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.milestone` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.milestone` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.reason` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.reason` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.startDate` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.startDate` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.

Element `ResearchSubject.progress.endDate` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchSubject.progress` requires a cross-version extension. Element `ResearchSubject.progress.endDate` is will have a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.
Element `ResearchSubject.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.period`.
Element `ResearchSubject.study` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.study`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ResearchSubject.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `ResearchSubject.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.individual`.
Element `ResearchSubject.assignedComparisonGroup` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.assignedArm`.
Element `ResearchSubject.actualComparisonGroup` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.actualArm`.
Element `ResearchSubject.consent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchSubject.consent`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
